Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory17.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Congratulations, John.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'Specialized frame and a specialized Inver-Device... We finally have some measurable results. Chrome never disappoints.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'John', 3: 'You look delighted.', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "If we can create more Constructs that don't rely on a commandant with this technology... I suppose the odds will start going in our favor.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: "I've got a meeting coming, so I have to go now. I'm guessing you've been waiting here to see your son return safely from that battlefield?", 4: '1'}
{2: 'John', 3: "That won't be necessary now that I know the frame has been adapted successfully.", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Nikola', 3: 'If you say so.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Heroes are plenty.'}
{3: 'Of course they are plenty. There cannot be just one.'}
{3: 'Anyone can grab a sword and face the monster. Anyone who does so is a hero.'}
{3: 'They either perish on their way to the monster or die under its blade.'}
{3: 'Before the monster is vanquished, no one will remember the names of the dead heroes. No one needs to.'}
{3: 'But then one of the heroes takes a stand, and he declaresâ€”'}
{3: '"I will carry their names and fight."'}
{1: '1', 2: 'John', 3: 'Surpass a Smith, is it...', 4: '1'}
{2: 'John', 3: 'None of us has said something like that before him.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'John', 3: 'He disobeyed my order, but when he called me Dad, I felt... glad.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'John', 3: 'I might not be your father, but you are my son.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'It has never been a kite that needs an anchor in his hands, but an eagle with its wings spread, ready to fly.'}
{3: 'The little boy standing in the shadows of the dark room back then has long left his nest.'}
{3: 'He knows how the story of a Smith ends.'}
{3: 'But he has no idea where this eagle will go.'}
{3: 'Maybe he will find the answer all Smiths have been searching for.'}
{3: 'Maybe he will finally grasp what no Smith has dared to dream.'}
